title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, December 24, 2014
teaser: Airing on Wednesday, December 24, 2014: First up on today's show, Molly Wood, Technology Columnist for the New York Times, joins us for a look-ahead at TV in 2015. And looking back at some of our favorite interviews of 2014, we revisit our conversation with Guy Kawasaki, the man who sold Apple’s Macintosh to the masses.
